PenmuxModule.Name: Session
PenmuxModule.Description: Module to persist penmux sessions and provide easy to use storage of module options

Option.Name: AutoLoad
Option.Description: If enabled sessions will be loaded automatically after cd into a directory that includes a session file

Option.Name: UseCwd
Option.Description: If enabled new session will be created as sub directory to the current dir

Option.Name: SessionDir
Option.Description: Default directory to use for sessions. Has no effect when UseCwd is set to true.
